attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Doom News
attacks.text: Return all Energy cards attached to Absol G to your hand. The Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out at the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Luring Flame
attacks.text: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Vapor Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Water Pokémon in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Pump Up
abilities.text: If your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left, Drifblim FB gets +40 HP.

attacks.name: Shadow Ball
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. Apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Dump and Draw
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Electric Current
attacks.text: Move a Lightning Energy card attached to Electivire FB to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dragon Intimidation
abilities.text: If Garchomp is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Garchomp is Knocked Out), choose an Energy card attached to the Attacking Pokémon and put it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Guard Claw
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Garchomp by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Evolutionary Flame
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Magmortar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Fire Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.text: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to Magmortar to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Gravitation
abilities.text: Each Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets -20 HP. No more than 20 HP can be reduced by all Gravitation Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Geo Impact
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that is the same type as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Trash Burst
attacks.text: You may discard up to 5 Energy cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Drain Punch
attacks.text: Remove from Regigigas FB a number of damage counters equal to the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rainbow Lariat
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokémon SP you have in play.

attacks.name: Raging Drill
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Rhyperior.

attacks.name: Deep Scrap
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon would be Knocked Out by this attack, discard the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Root Protector
abilities.text: Any damage done to Swampert by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Push Over
attacks.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to Swampert.

abilities.name: Green Aroma
abilities.text: Remove all Special Conditions from each of your Grass Pokémon. Each of your Grass Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Desperate Pollen
attacks.text: If Venusaur already has 8 or more damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Special Reaction
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by any Special Conditions, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage for each of those Special Conditions.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Yanmega is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a Grass Energy card and attach it to Yanmega. This power can't be used if Yanmega is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Wind Return
attacks.text: You may return all Grass Energy attached to Yanmega to your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you returned.

abilities.name: Extreme Speed
abilities.text: Arcanine G's Retreat Cost is Colorless less for each Fire Energy attached to Arcanine G.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Poké-Bodies, each of Butterfree FB's attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Select Powder
attacks.text: Choose either Burned or Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Moving Fire
attacks.text: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to Camerupt.

attacks.name: Volcanic Crash
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. For each tails, discard the top card of your deck. Ignore this effect if your opponent has any Water Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Earth Power
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flame Jet
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Heal Bell
attacks.text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Psywave
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Count the amount of Energy attached to that Pokémon. Put that many damage counters on the Pokémon.

attacks.name: Antique Magic
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on any Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) in any way you like.

attacks.name: Synchro Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has the same remaining HP as Claydol, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.text: You may switch Crawdaunt G with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.text: Any damage done to Dewgong by attacks from Fire Pokémon and Water Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Fighting Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 30.

abilities.name: Echo Draw
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Dodrio is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ghost Hand
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cursed Wrath
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon SP in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Rushing Water
attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Escort
attacks.text: If you played any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Erasing Sound
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Knock Back
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Darkness Restore
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Honchkrow is your Active Pokémon and your opponent's Bench isn't full, you may use this power. Search your opponent's discard pile for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto his or her bench. This power can't be used if Honchkrow is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Riot
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon that isn't an evolved Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Licking-Licking Heal
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, remove 2 damage counters from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Mid-air Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Marvel Eyes
abilities.text: If you have Solrock in play, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to any of your Lunatone or Solrock by your opponent's Pokémon LV.X.

attacks.name: Gravity Wave
attacks.text: Does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that doesn't have a Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Turnaround Standby
attacks.text: During your next turn, any damage done by Mawile's Swallow or Bite to your opponent's Active Pokémon is increased by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Swallow
attacks.text: Remove from Mawile the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Channeling
attacks.text: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

attacks.name: Chakra Points
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each card in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Milotic C. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sky Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Focus Wall
abilities.text: If Mr. Mime would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack that does 70 or more damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), Mr. Mime is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Desperate Slap
attacks.text: If Mr. Mime already has 5 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Nutritional Support
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hibernation Spore
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, the Defending Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Top Drop
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck. If you discarded a Pokémon, this attack does damage equal to the HP of that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brick Break
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.text: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Roserade C, remove all Special Conditions from Roserade C.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and remove 2 damage counters from Roserade C.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

abilities.name: Dig Down
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards in your deck. Choose as many Fighting Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Sandslash is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Needle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Horn Pierce
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Endure
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Seaking would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Seaking is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

abilities.name: Marvel Shell
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Shedinja by your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Spike Wound
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Sunshine Fate
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Lunatone in play, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Solrock is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Luna Turn
attacks.text: If Lunatone is in your discard pile, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. Then, search your discard pile for Lunatone, show it to your opponent, and shuffle it into your deck.

attacks.name: Synchro Removal
attacks.text: If any Energy card attached to Spinda is the same type as any Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, discard 1 of those Energy cards from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulled Punch
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.text: Remove all Special Conditions and 4 damage counters from Wailord. Wailord is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Giant Wave
attacks.text: Wailord can't use Giant Wave during your next turn.

attacks.name: Lightning Wing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Sonic Wing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Hover Hit
attacks.text: The Retreat Cost for the Defending Pokémon is 0 until the end of your next turn.

attacks.name: Crash Bomber
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage. Then, discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swallow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove from Carnivine the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Disrupting Spy
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Chatot G from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back on top of your opponent's deck in any order. 0 Search and Escape Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put Chatot G and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Cherrim is now Confused.

attacks.name: Mach Blow
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Pokémon SP, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 20.

attacks.name: Giant Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Jet Screw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Evolutionary Pollen
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Ivysaur from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stomp Off
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Magmar.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Plunge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Marshtomp is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, move all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokémon to Marshtomp. If you do, switch Marshtomp with that Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Intimidating Pattern
abilities.text: As long as Masquerain is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Skim Attack
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

abilities.name: Metallic Lift
abilities.text: If Metang has any Metal Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Metang is 0.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cleansing Ring
attacks.text: You may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, remove 4 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Trash Charge
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Circling Dive
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Switch Ninjask with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Parallel Drain
attacks.text: Remove from 1 of your Pokémon the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Draw In

attacks.name: Gripthrow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.

attacks.name: Sever
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Find
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Trainer card or a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Biting Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin, if heads this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Grand Swell
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon for each Pokémon Tool and Stadium card your opponent has in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Fury Attack

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Silver Feather
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, when your opponent puts a Basic Pokémon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Max
attacks.text: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Skarmory FB. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 20 damage plus 40 damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Chatot does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Battle Tower
rules: Whenever any player plays any Pokémon from his or her hand to Level-Up 1 of his or her Pokémon, remove 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Champion's Room
rules: The Retreat cost for each Pokémon SP (both yours and your opponent's) is Colorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Cynthia's Guidance
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cyrus's Initiative
rules: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, look at your opponent's hand. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck in any order.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Night Teleporter
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, put all cards in your hand on top of your deck. Then, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Palmer's Contribution
rules: Search your discard pile for up to 5 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: VS Seeker
rules: Put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

abilities.name: Darkness Send
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Absol G LV.X from your hand onto your Active Absol G, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, put the top card from your opponent's deck in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Darkness Slugger
attacks.text: You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Burning Spirit
abilities.text: Any damage done by attacks to a Burned Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is increased by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). No more than 40 damage can be added by all Burning Spirit Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Jet Shoot
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Blaziken FB by attacks is increased by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Call for Power
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Charizard G. This power can't be used if Charizard G is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Malevolent Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy attached to Charizard G.

abilities.name: Energy Recycle
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. Search your discard pile for up to 3 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. This power can't be used if Electivire FB is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Healing Breath
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Garchomp C LV.X from your hand onto your Active Garchomp C, you may remove all damage counters from each of your Pokémon SP.

attacks.name: Dragon Rush
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp C. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Garchomp C can't use Dragon Rush during your next turn.

abilities.name: Dragon Spirit
abilities.text: If Rayquaza C is your Active Pokémon and is damaged but not Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, you may search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Rayquaza C.

attacks.name: Final Blowup
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza C. Ignore this effect if you have no cards in your hand.

abilities.name: Fast Call
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Staraptor FB is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Defog
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, this attack's base damage is 70 instead of 40.

attacks.name: Diamond Dust
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hyper Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Moltres. If tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Moltres. If you can't discard Energy cards, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Lightning Burn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.
